snippet: Vinod Khosla, the prominent venture capitalist, says Silicon Valley is in danger of losing its way if a Wall Street mentality takes hold. "You want missionaries, not mercenaries," he writes in a guest post.
abstract: Vinod Khosla, the prominent venture capitalist, says Silicon Valley is in danger of losing its way if a Wall Street mentality takes hold. "You want missionaries, not mercenaries," he writes in a guest post.

headline.main: Vinod Khosla: Maintain the Silicon Valley Vision
